{{cpp/chrono/title|leap_second_info}}
{{cpp/chrono/utc_clock/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
struct leap_second_info {
    bool is_leap_second;
    std::chrono::seconds elapsed;
};
}}

A {{tt|leap_second_info}} indicates whether a UTC time is during a positive leap second insertion and the total number of leap seconds between 1 January 1970 and the UTC time.

{{tt|leap_second_info}} has no base classes or members other than {{c|is_leap_second}}, {{c|elapsed}}, and implicitly declared special member functions.

===Member objects===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc mem obj|nolink=true|is_leap_second|whether the UTC time is during a positive leap second insertion}}
{{dsc mem obj|nolink=true|elapsed|the sum of leap seconds between 1 January 1970 and the UTC time}}
{{dsc end}}

===Notes===
{{tt|leap_second_info}} is typically obtained from {{lc|std::chrono::get_leap_second_info}}.
